评论概述: Cute But not the material you think
评论详情: Is this cute? YES! Is the fit flattering? YES! Are colors cute? YES! BUT this is not a sweater. It is a very thin sweatshirt. No insulating fabric. But I personally like it because it’s perfect for fall transition pieces. Where my disappointment comes in is because it’s not true stitching on sweater fabric like it’s made to appear. It is dyed and printed fabric. So up close it’s cheap looking but from far it’s VERY cute. I’m 5ft and have a PCOS belly and weight of 170. I was shipped a medium and it fits great! I’m keeping for sure but just wish my expectation had known it was printed and not truly stitched.
The pull over is heavy and the colors are bright. It is oversized, I’d size down if you don’t want a baggy look. The pull over is comfortable and has held up in the wash after 3 cycles.
Great oversized light weight sweater that will be great in the fall
This fits well and is very comfy. I like that it's stylish enough to be worn around the house or for a casual night out with friends.

I am happy with this sweater. It's not as thick as I expected but it has some weight to it. I think that it'll be a good mix of breathable and protective from the cold when Fall hits. The pattern is great and chic, the style is adorable, and the size is exactly what I wanted. Overall I'm happy with it!
I'm 5.5" tall and 140 lbs I normally wear a medium.  Based on reviews I ordered a large. This top is far from oversized and very blocky. Material is weird.
The print and idea is cute but the actual fabric seems cheap and it doesn't have the greatest shape
Keeping it for when I need long sleeves but it won't be in regular rotation.
Love this !! Great length for leggings and boots in the fall.

Interesting, fun, and differently striped sweatshirt than are usually available. The red with the black, white, and tan provides a fresh and modern look. Nice roomy sweatshirt but not too baggy. Easy to wear dressed up with some cute red leather flats and cropped leather pants or pair with jeans and sneakers. This sweatshirt opens the door to many styling options.

The fit is nice.  It fits true to sized with a slight bagginess.  If you like more fitted, I’d size down.  I got my usual size, and it’s got some room in the sleeves and in the midsection.  It’ll be a good casual top with leggings or boyfriend jeans.The main reason for 4 stars is the fabric.  It’s hard to capture in a picture, but the fabric is almost shiny.  Not quite shiny, but it def has a sheen.  It’s not soft.  It’s ok, but if you have sensory issues and prefer soft fabric, I’d try a different top.  This is hard to describe but more of a stiff texture.  It’s not scratch, but it’s def not soft.
Soft and comfortable, perfect for the fall or winter. It looks just like the advertisement photos, I cannot wait to wear it!

5’6 180lb size large. So first photo, looks huge, put on, fits good, definitely not oversized, as in what one would expecting an oversize shirt. Also the cut in band makes it lay goffy . Overall not a bad shirt , not sweater and not sweatshirt material. Very thin .

This is a nice casual sweater for the ladies. You can wear it around the house, or hang out with the girls. Can be worn with jeans, shorts or skirts for a luncheon. Change to a long skirt, our slacks and would be nice for a casual dinner.

This sweatshirt is comfortable and fits great. I wish it were a smidge longer, but it's a nice casual sweatshirt. The color is also spot-on with the pictures listed. I'm 5'1" and 150 lbs.  I ordered a large. Fits great.
The design is no nice and its soft, fits well.

This is a super comfy sweater that will be great for casual days when it gets cool. I am an 18/20 US and got an X-Large. The fit was just as shown in the image. Honestly, it is perfect for me. One thing I don't like is when sweaters have fleece lining because, although it is soft, it is too hot for where I live. This sweater doesn't have an added lining so it will breathe nicely in the mild climate of my home state.  I will say, I am fairly short (~5'4) and have have a pretty short torso. The shirt hit me right at the hip. If I were any longer, I am not sure I would like the fit as much because I was looking for something that was slouchy casual.
